about_the_game:
Strategically navigate the hexagonal grid through over 75 puzzles, solving each to find the treasure, reach the exit, and tackle up to 3 optional challenges per puzzle! But be warned, the place is crawling with enemies, so you will have to use various daggers throughout...

Like the Poison-Dagger to kick them off the board...


And the Shadow-Dagger to move to your target and turn yourself invisible!


Or you could just run away...


There are currently 5 different enemies and 4 types of daggers, each with completely different movements and abilities. Some daggers can be picked up, while others are obtained in different ways but all of them can only be used in the current level. Almost all puzzles are designed to be solved in multiple ways, with the majority having optional challenges to complete, such as not being spotted or not using any of the daggers. These add another level of difficulty, as some can be pretty tricky to overcome! Can you complete them all?

name: Rogue's Hexagon
short_description: A turn-based puzzle game set in a hexagonal world where you strategically move and throw powerful daggers to solve dozens of puzzles and optional challenges.
